law.catch_line: The provisions of §§ 15-1623 and 15-1624 of this part do not apply to a pharmacy benefits manager ...
law.text: The provisions of §§ 15-1623 and 15-1624 of this part do not apply to a pharmacy benefits manager when providing pharmacy benefits management services to a purchaser that is affiliated with the pharmacy benefits manager through common ownership within an insurance holding company.
